paragraphs: The Tales of Tribute Novice Tournament is about to begin! Roister's Club members hoping to advance in rank should present themselves for matches in the following locations:
The Rosy Lion Inn, in the city of Daggerfall, in Glenumbra
The Dead Wolf Inn, in the city of Shornhelm, in Rivenspire
The Cloudy Dregs Inn, in the city of Wayrest, in Stormhaven
